LanguageData.Skynet_Cloak.label: Skynet Cloak
LanguageData.Skynet_Cloak.description: A high tech Skynet cloak, often worn by terminators.
LanguageData.Apparello_GShell.label: Light Power Armor
LanguageData.Apparello_GShell.description: Powered light armor fashioned after the infamous light power armor mark IV. It comes attached with GlitOrion© hip'n'hop™ thrusters, which enables slightly faster movement.
LanguageData.Apparello_GShellII.label: Medium Power Armor
LanguageData.Apparello_GShellII.description: Powered medium armor, designed for light infantry and support units. It is less famous and bulkier than light power armor. It comes attached with GlitOrion© hip'n'hop™ thrusters, which enables slightly faster movement.
LanguageData.Apparello_Syndicate.label: Syndicate Coat
LanguageData.Apparello_Syndicate.description: A long coat with bulletproof alloy breastplate. Modern technology full of grit.
